Html:
Hi,
I've done about a dozen different key reassignments (Using Calculator->Options->Keys->Emulator) for my computer keyboard, and all of them went smoothly except for a reassignment for the ALPHA key. I did the following:
  1. Removed Ctrl
  2. Assigned Right Ctrl,
    and then I found that I could no longer get either my right or left Ctrl to work, even after many attempts at removing/reassigning both Ctrl and Right Ctrl. As a workaround, I then:
  3. Assigned Left for ALPHA
    Currently, this is working, but I was wondering if it is possible to get back to the original configuration (Ctrl) assignment. Thanks, and everything else in Wabbitemu is working great...it's really amazing software!
Uhh...nevermind...I'm a complete moron. I think that I just mentally blocked out that RESET button...Now that I've reset and done the key reassignments again, everything is great!
